text:
Message 1890 of 4024
I’d love for us to think about what the kids would like to see first. Think about what we are willing to do for them. And begin again with an eye to the
future. It’s just taking Dr Brown’s advice and living for tomorrow instead of yesterday.
I known we don’t forget, and actions have consequences. And they have. Terrible ones that are doing awful things to the family. No one will ever
forget this. But it’s up to you and I what happens now. What’s the life we want?
I’d love to hear your thoughts and share mine. I’d also like to do something brave that may even be inspiring to our children in ten years. Hating each
other is the easy route. Getting past our history and thriving in spite of it is hard.
• How do we want to be remembered?
• What is our legacy going to be?
I’d love to talk about that when you are ready...

Subject:Re: New Chapter?

Hey-
I was trying to continue a thread we had with all the relevant links to the parenting plan we had in it. You can’t do that here.
So I sent it and said I’d move back here after I shared. But I don’t know if you are going to acknowledge it or ignore it on email.
The two things noted there were:
What’s your thoughts on AD and I getting together?
How do you feel about my parenting plan thoughts?
It will be much easier if you reply there so you have both the links and the context. I can’t duplicate that on OFW.
Thanks
